title: --existing=replace should indeed replace remote directory first if it exists
body:
or may be just detection has failed for my use case
this is datalad from nf-dataset-web-interface  branch:

``` shell
$> datalad -l debug create-publication-target-sshwebserver --shared all --existing=replace onerussian.com:www/video/OHBM2015 1r-www 
2016-08-28 15:59:10,138 [DEBUG  ] Resolved dataset for target creation: <Dataset path=/home/yoh/#video/OHBM2015> (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:165)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,155 [INFO   ] Connecting ... (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:206)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,155 [DEBUG  ] Try starting control master by calling:
| ['ssh', '-o', 'ControlMaster=auto', '-o', 'ControlPersist=yes', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', 'exit'] (sshconnector.py:120)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,345 [INFO   ] Creating target dataset OHBM2015 at www/video/OHBM2015 (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:229)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,345 [DEBUG  ] Running: ['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'ls'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"] (cmd.py:352)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,398 [DEBUG  ] stdout| www/video/OHBM2015 (cmd.py:352)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,399 [DEBUG  ] Running: ['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'mkdir'", "'-p'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"] (cmd.py:352)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,452 [DEBUG  ] stderr| mkdir: cannot create directory `www/video/OHBM2015': File exists (cmd.py:352)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,453 [DEBUG  ] Failed to run ['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'mkdir'", "'-p'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"] under None. Exit code=1. out= err=mkdir: cannot create directory `www/video/OHBM2015': File exists
|  (cmd.py:296)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,453 [ERROR  ] Remotely creating target directory failed at www/video/OHBM2015.
| Error: CommandError: command '['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'mkdir'", "'-p'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"]' failed with exitcode 1.
| Failed to run ['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'mkdir'", "'-p'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"] under None. Exit code=1. out= err=mkdir: cannot create directory `www/video/OHBM2015': File exists
|  [cmd.py:run:297] (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:258)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,453 [DEBUG  ] Closing 1 SSH connections... (sshconnector.py:234)
2016-08-28 15:59:10,454 [DEBUG  ] Running: ['ssh', '-O', 'stop', '-S', u'/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com'] (cmd.py:352)
 (cmd.py:352):59:10,459 [DEBUG  ] stderr| Stop listening request sent.
...
```

but similar one from current master:

``` shell
$> datalad -l debug create-publication-target-sshwebserver --shared all --existing=replace onerussian.com:www/video/OHBM2015 1r-www
2016-08-28 16:01:42,657 [DEBUG  ] Resolved dataset for target creation: <Dataset path=/home/yoh/#video/OHBM2015> (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:158)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,670 [INFO   ] Connecting ... (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:199)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,670 [DEBUG  ] Try starting control master by calling:
| ['ssh', '-o', 'ControlMaster=auto', '-o', 'ControlPersist=yes', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', 'exit'] (sshconnector.py:120)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,862 [INFO   ] Creating target dataset OHBM2015 at www/video/OHBM2015 (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:219)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,862 [DEBUG  ] Running: ['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'ls'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"] (cmd.py:352)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,915 [DEBUG  ] stdout| www/video/OHBM2015 (cmd.py:352)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,915 [DEBUG  ] Running: ['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'mkdir'", "'-p'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"] (cmd.py:352)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,968 [DEBUG  ] stderr| mkdir: cannot create directory `www/video/OHBM2015': File exists (cmd.py:352)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,968 [DEBUG  ] Failed to run ['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'mkdir'", "'-p'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"] under None. Exit code=1. out= err=mkdir: cannot create directory `www/video/OHBM2015': File exists
|  (cmd.py:296)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,969 [ERROR  ] Remotely creating target directory failed at www/video/OHBM2015.
| Error: CommandError: command '['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'mkdir'", "'-p'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"]' failed with exitcode 1.
| Failed to run ['ssh', '-o', u'ControlPath=/home/yoh/.config/datalad/onerussian.com', u'onerussian.com', "'mkdir'", "'-p'", "'www/video/OHBM2015'"] under None. Exit code=1. out= err=mkdir: cannot create directory `www/video/OHBM2015': File exists
|  [cmd.py:run:297] (create_publication_target_sshwebserver.py:248)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,969 [DEBUG  ] Resolved datasetfor sibling addition: <Dataset path=/home/yoh/#video/OHBM2015> (dataset.py:505)
2016-08-28 16:01:42,970 [DEBUG  ] Remote '1r-www' already exists
```
